chunks.text:
halhoub.com>; Suhaila Mohammad <Suhaila.Mohammad@chalhoub.com>; Vellachery DINESAN <Vellachery.DINESAN@chalhoub.com>; Waqas JAN <Waqas.JAN@chalhoub.com>
CC: May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-25 09:25
Subject: Thank You for 2024 and Happy Holiday Wishes
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Team,
 As we are near the end of this remarkable year, I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for each and every one of you. This year has been a testament to your dedication, hard work, and unwavering commitment, and it would not have been possible to achieve our success without your efforts.
Your contributions have been invaluable, and we truly appreciate the energy, time, and expertise that you have put into your work. Whether it was managing day-to-day tasks, tackling unexpected challenges, or going above and beyond to support one another, you have made a significant impact on the success of our team.
As we approach the holiday season, I want to wish you and your loved ones a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. May this festive season bring you joy, peace, and well-deserved rest, and may the coming year be filled with health, happiness, and new opportunities.
Thank you once again for making this year so successful, and we look forward to continuing our journey together in the year ahead.
Warm regards,


RAMI RIMAN​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000
